title: Unravelling air/moisture stability of cathode materials in sodium ion batteries: characterization, rational design, and perspectives
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00796D, Review Article
Shipeng Jia, Shinichi Kumakura, Eric McCalla
Na-ion batteries have garnered significant attention as environmentally friendly alternatives to Li-ion batteries. However, instability in air prevents commercialization of high energy cathodes. Concerted efforts are required to overcome this key limitation.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
